item.title: Quick and dirty Python scripts
item.author: Author
item.description: Couple small scripts for Marketing Analytics calculations Customer Lifetime Value Break Even Units total net profit in Marketing experiments

item.title: Python: list comprehension
item.author: Author
item.description: caÅ‚a lista new_list = [element.method() for element in old_list] wrunkowo z if new_list = [element.method() for element in old_list if element = “chosen”] warunkowo z if/else new_list = [element.method() if element != “exception” else element.exception_method() for element in old_list]
